intro.title: Hi, Jazzy Here!
intro.description: I love watching movies, listening to music, occasional cooking and enjoying the food that I cooked, driving in cool breeze on an empty road. I love samosa, sandwich and aloo parantha - everything with aloo in it. I lurk on internet maybe to find my tribe of internet friends or to find myself or just because I like it here.
